incidents.name: Riverside Flooding
incidents.constraints: Bridge A closed; power outage south; limited boats
incidents.details: River levels rising after heavy rainfall. Low-lying neighborhoods are inundated; shelter opening underway.

incidents.name: Foothills Wildfire
incidents.resources: 3 engines; 2 water tenders; 25 volunteers; high school gym shelter
incidents.constraints: Heavy smoke; one-lane access road; high winds
incidents.details: Fire moving north-east with shifting winds; smoke affecting nearby neighborhoods.

updates.text: Spot fire contained near Ridge Rd.

incidents.name: Bay Quake Aftershocks
incidents.resources: 4 ambulances; 2 USAR teams; 40 volunteers; convention center shelter
incidents.constraints: Elevator outages; minor road buckling; limited cell coverage
incidents.details: Series of aftershocks reported; structural assessments in progress.

incidents.name: Coastal Storm Prep — Miami
incidents.resources: 2 shelters; 3 supply depots; 15 volunteers; 1 mobile clinic
incidents.constraints: Storm surge risk; limited sandbags; traffic congestion
incidents.details: Tropical storm approaching; preparing for potential hurricane upgrade within 24–36 hours.

incidents.name: Mountain Pass Landslide
incidents.constraints: One-lane access; unstable slope; rockfall hazard
incidents.details: Recent storms triggered a landslide blocking access to several cabins above Golden.

updates.text: County crews en route with heavy machinery.

incidents.name: Monsoon Flooding — Dhaka
incidents.constraints: Contaminated water; blocked alleys; power cuts
incidents.details: Monsoon rains have flooded several wards; shelters at schools opening.

incidents.name: Tokyo Aftershocks
incidents.resources: USAR team; 2 field hospitals; 6 ambulances; 60 volunteers
incidents.constraints: Rail delays; elevator outages; fuel shortage
incidents.details: Persistent aftershocks; structural inspections ongoing; temporary shelter capacity being expanded.

incidents.name: Sydney Bushland Fire
incidents.resources: 2 air tankers; 5 engines; 30 volunteers; community center shelter
incidents.constraints: High winds; thick smoke; heat advisory
incidents.details: Bushfire spreading north-west; air quality warnings issued for suburbs.
